alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carbon and southwestern Albany Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Hanna, or 29 miles east of Rawlins, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Saratoga, Hanna, Encampment, Sinclair, Medicine Bow, Elk Mountain, Grand Encampment, Battle Lake, Six Mile Campground, Brooklyn Lake Campground, Nash Fork Campground, Ryan Park Campground, Separation Lake, Bottle Creek Campground, Rob Roy Reservoir, Bobbie Thompson Campground, Arlington, Hog Park Reservoir and French Creek Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 211 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
